title: Bug 117981: Any item cannot be selected at first in library outline view
description: Description: Any item cannot be selected at first in library outline view. Steps to reproduce: 1. Add a label to a library file. 2. Select the label item in the library outline view. 3. Observe that the item cannot be selected at the first attempt.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the item cannot be selected.
EB: The expected behavior is that any item in the library outline view can be selected on the first attempt.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Add a label to a library file. 2. Open the library outline view. 3. Attempt to select the label item. Note that it is not possible to select the item on the first try. Instead, it can be selected on the second attempt.
